General.Name: NBT Inc.
General.Description: NBT inc. provides mobile advertisement services in South Korea. It develops Cash Slide, a smartphone lock-screen application that offers mobile advertising, news, and trend information. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

5.Name: Ms. Joo-Young  Jang
5.Title: Exec. Director & Head of Advter. Division
